"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/535c52fc6368727af1550200#post_535c52fc6368727af1550200
Anyone that says that subbed are fundamentally better regardless of voice actor quality is a idiot.

Sure subbed are more often than not better and that things get lost in translation, but hory shit gurren lagann's dub is *WAY* better than the subbed version.

I'm not going to lie, the original gurren lagann's voices in japanese are straight up boring and have little emotion to them.

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/535c543163687223cf5e0200#post_535c543163687223cf5e0200
Okay. . trashboat I'm going to stop you right here.  Rosetta only covers basic japanese and being fluent in japanese takes years, not months.  If you ever visit japan no one will understand a word you're saying.  There's a massive difference between following rosetta and actually being fluent in a language.

If you want to be fluent you're going to have to after finishing rosetta stone read a entire japanese dictionary several times over to get a firm grasp of the language.
